abilities.name: Vicious Insight
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[DEVASTATING WOUNDS]** ability.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Gaze
abilities.rule: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
